Package numerics.hyperbolics

The numerics.hyperbolics class provides methods to calculate gamma functions and the modified Bessel function of the first kind [ bessel(X,V) ] for real values X & V.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
bessel Overview
The Bessel class provides the function bessel_function that returns the modified bessel function of the first kind [ bessel(X,V) ] for real values X & V.
gamma Overview
The gamma class provides a the function gamma_function which can calculate the mathematical function gamma(X) for real arguments of X.
 

Package numerics.hyperbolics Description

The numerics.hyperbolics class provides methods to calculate gamma functions and the modified Bessel function of the first kind [ bessel(X,V) ] for real values X & V. The routines in this package were ported from C++ routines which were originally ported from Fortran routines written by the RISOE Computer Laboratory .

Version:
1.0 (October 2001)
Author:
Tony Held
